create.heading: Set up a passkey
paragraphs: You’ll be asked to scan your face or fingerprint, or enter your device passcode, PIN or pattern.
create.guidanceNoticeTitle: Where will my passkey be saved?
guidanceNoticeParagraphs: Your passkey will be saved privately to your device or cloud account  - such as your password manager.
Your biometric data won’t be shared with GOV.UK One Login or any services that you access with it.

success.heading: You’ve set up a passkey
paragraphs: Next time you sign in, you can scan your face or fingerprint, or enter your device PIN, passcode or pattern.
You won’t need your GOV.UK One Login  password or a security code.
